name: CITEO
membership: Packaging Chain Forum (Europen); ACR+; EPR Club (ACR+); PROsPA (unformal WG with PROs of Germany, Austria, Portugal; Poland; England and Ireland); PET Core; OCCE; MEDEF
goal: Citeo, a non-profit company, was created in 2017 as the result of the merger of two companies, both covered by the extended producer responsibility (EPR) for packaging (Eco-Emballages created 1992) and graphic papers (Ecofolio created 2007). 50,000 companies have entrusted Citeo with the task of organizing the end of life of their packaging and papers. Our governance is representative of our client companies and the material sectors involved in both the production of packaging and the recovery of recycled materials.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
Circular Economy Package and all Policy deriving from it, in particular regarding waste, packaging, paper, recycling, plastics, eco-design, contaminants, hazardous substances, secondary-raw materials, microplastics
Plastics Strategy - Single use directive (SUP) / Circular Plastics Alliance
REACH regulation
